attributes.action: place a crossing along Heybridge Approach in Maldon, Essex following a recent fatality and numerous accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heybridge Approach in Maldon Essex lies between a large housing development and a Nature Reserve and is currently a 60mph speed limit. As the park is so widely used by children and dog walkers it would make sense not only to reduce the speed limit but also to install a pedestrian crossing so that the road may be crossed safely.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "place a crossing along Heybridge Approach in Maldon, Essex following a recent fatality and numerous accidents."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17310


Prime Minister's Office
